title: Beast, Part Four
description: If you read Beast part three, I don't think I need to entice you to grab part four. Beast and Annabelle are f*cked - and you know they're f*ckING, too. It's crazy intense and twisty. You'll like it. Did I mention it's the last installment in this series? All you wait-till-they're-all-outers can start reading now!  If you haven't read part one, it's free! Start here: http://www.amazon.com/Beast-Part-Erot...
author: Ella James
